item.title: Hugo Deploy Error because of some configs depressiation
item.description: While deploying blog post with Hugo engine to Github, the following error received: 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 Run hugo --minify Start building sites … hugo v0.132.1-1bde700dfc0770bb11eb8445aff1ab5abdccb46e linux/amd64 BuildDate=2024-08-13T10:10:10Z VendorInfo=gohugoio ERROR deprecated: .Site.DisqusShortname was deprecated in Hugo v0.120.0 and will be removed in Hugo 0.133.0. Use .Site.Config.Services.Disqus.Shortname instead. Total in 78 ms Error: error building site: logged 1 error(s) Error: Process completed with exit code 1. The grep -Rnie "site.
